content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I was created. My latest action resulted in an error message: "Command None returned: Error: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'lower'".
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='assistant', content="{'thoughts': {'text': 'I think I should start by exploring the Brno Reservoir trail and the surrounding area. It seems like a good place to start my adventure and it's also close to where I am currently located. I will need to plan my route and stops carefully to make the most of my time and resources.', 'reasoning': 'I chose this because it aligns with my goal of exploring the world and it is a feasible and safe option.', 'plan': '- Research the Brno Reservoir trail and surrounding area\\n- Plan my route and stops using the performance evaluation resource provided\\n- Pack necessary supplies and equipment\\n- Begin my adventure', 'criticism': 'I need to be careful not to get too caught up in planning and to actually take action and start exploring. I also need to be mindful of my resources and not waste them on unnecessary expenses.', 'speak': 'I will begin my adventure by exploring the Brno Reservoir trail and surrounding area. I have planned my route and stops and am excited to start exploring.'}, 'command': {'name': 'execute_shell', 'args': {'command_line': 'firefox https://mapy.cz/s/3vJX3'}}}", type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command None returned: Error: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'lower'", type='action_result')]
"""
